title: Literaturnoe Nasledstvo
additional-notes: This is a Russian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

Issues in this series may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such issues are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
